description: The Polo Soft fit puts a modern spin on classic preppy style with a natural shoulder and a half-canvassed construction. Crafted from Italian herringbone tweed, this version is made with warm wool and finished with leather details.
fitting_details: Polo Soft: trimmer than our Polo model, with a soft shoulder, a high armhole, 3¼" lapels, and a shorter length.
Size 40R has a 30" front body length, a 29½" back body length, an 18½" shoulder, and a 17½" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttonhole at the left lapel. Suede undercollar. Three-button silhouette. Braided leather buttons.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist patch pockets.
Double vent. Lined at the sleeves and the back yoke.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Shell: wool, nylon, other fibers. Undercollar: suede. Back yoke lining: polyester. Sleeve lining: acetate, viscose. Dry clean by a leather specialist. Imported.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 40R.
